member.summary: For private use only. Gets an indicator if this is a success response or an error response.
member.returns: True if it's a success response, False if it's an error response.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.DataTablesResponse.SerializeData(System.Object)
member.summary:
Transforms a data object into a json element using Json.Net library. Can be overriten when needed.
Data will be serialized with camelCase convention by default, since it's a JavaScript standard. This should not interfere with DataTables' CamelCase X HungarianNotation issue.
member.param: Data object to be transformed to json.
member.returns: A json representation of your data.

member.name: T:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options
member.summary: Represents a configuration object for DataTables.AspNet.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.DefaultPageLength
member.summary: Gets default page length when parameter is not set.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.IsDrawValidationEnabled
member.summary: Gets an indicator if draw parameter should be validated.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.IsRequestAdditionalParametersEnabled
member.summary: Gets an indicator whether request parameters parsing is enabled or not.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.IsResponseAdditionalParametersEnabled
member.summary: Gets an indicator whether response parameters parsing is enabled or not.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.RequestNameConvention
member.summary: Gets the request name convention to be used when resolving request parameters.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.ResponseNameConvention
member.summary: Gets the response name convention to be used when serializing response elements.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.SetDefaultPageLength(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the default page length to be used when request parameter is not set. Page length is set to 10 by default.
member.param: The new default page length to be used.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.EnableDrawValidation
member.summary: Enables draw validation. Draw validation is enabled by default.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.DisableDrawValidation
member.summary: Disables draw validation. As stated by jQuery DataTables, draw validation should not be disabled unless explicitly required.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.EnableRequestAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Enables parsing request aditional parameters. You must provide your own function for parameter resolution on DataTables.AspNet registration.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.DisableRequestAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Disables parsing request aditional parameters. Aditional parameters are not resolved by default for security reasons.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.EnableResponseAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Enables parsing response aditional parameters.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.DisableResponseAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Disables parsing response aditional parameters. Aditional parameters are not resolved by default for security reasons.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.UseCamelCase
member.summary: Forces DataTables to use CamelCase on request/respose parameter names. CamelCase is enabled by default and is available for DataTables 1.10 and above.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.UseHungarianNotation
member.summary: Forces DataTables to use HungarianNotation on request/response parameter names. HungarianNotation is available for compatibility with older/legacy DataTables (prior to 1.10).

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new 'Option' instance.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Mvc5.Options.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,DataTables.AspNet.Core.NameConvention.IRequestNameConvention,DataTables.AspNet.Core.NameConvention.IResponseNameConvention)
member.summary: Creates a new 'Option' instance.
member.param: Default page length to be used.
Indicates if draw validation will be enabled by default or not.
Indicates whether request aditional parameters parsing is enabled or not.
Indicates whether response aditional parameters parsing is enabled or not.
Request naming convention to be used.
Response naming convention to be used.
